Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 69th/Hamilton
ShortDescription: Eastbound 67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 67th, Damen and 69th: due to, street blockage near 69th/Hamilton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 67th, Damen and 69th: due to, street blockage near 69th/Hamilton.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute near Michigan /Cermak
ShortDescription: #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan /Cermak, due to street blockage near Michigan /Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan /Cermak, due to street blockage near Michigan /Cermak.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Cermak, King Drive, 26th, then resume their normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, 25th, King Drive, Cermak, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
